metadata.title: CVE-2020-19144 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - negligible
metadata.description:
Buffer Overflow in LibTiff v4.0.10 allows attackers to cause a denial ofservice via the 'in _TIFFmemcpy' funtion in the component 'tif_unix.c'.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-19144` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.3.0-6
libtiff-tools - 4.3.0-6
libtiff5 - 4.3.0-6
libtiffxx5 - 4.3.0-6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.0-6').
